text: Inglott is a surname. Notable people with this surname include: . *Wenceslao Benítez Inglott (1879-1955), Spanish counter admiral and scientist. *Peter Serracino Inglott (1936–2012), rector of the University of Malta, linguist and author. *Jerome Inglott (1776–1835), Maltese philosopher and theologian. *William Inglott (1553–1621), English organist and composer. *Martin Cauchi Inglott (born 1967), Maltese senior retired Armed Forces of Malta officer, diplomat and the current secretary general of the Democratic Party. ==See also== *Inglot
title: Inglott
